content: fuzzballs is an original crochet pattern by june gilbank use up some of those eyelash yarn scraps we all have lurking at the bottom of our stash fuzzballs come in 2 sizes and have endless options for customization with stitched on eyes or no eyes and some catnip inside they make a really good cat toy *** > ***please join us*** *in the planetjune crochet designs > group http //www ravelry com/groups/planetjune-crochet-designs > - you can get pattern support join crochet-alongs show off your fos > suggest new designs and chat all > welcome * 1 http //planetjune com/shop/index php main_page=product_info&cpath=11_22&products_id=93
